name: Thwackey

evolution.description: Thwackey can evolve into Rillaboom at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Beat Pokémon. The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.description: If the move is known, this Pokémon may use the Grassy Terrain move as a bonus action.
